content: in / 50 cm tail after your cowl is blocked you will use this tail to seam your cowl finishing wet block cowl to measurements on page 1 laying flat to dry once dry twist the cowl on half turn and seam the shorter edges together using the mattress stitch weave in the ends 2 instagram https //www instagram com/kendra elaine knits/ if you share photos of your kek projects make sure to tag me and use the hashtags #kendraelaineknits and #garterfishcowl ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/kendra-elaine pattern support kendra elaine knits@gmail com 3
